dct_title_s: Carte de l'Empire Français et du Royaume d'Italie
dct_alternative_sm: Map of the French Empire and the Kingdom of Italy Divided by departments and Military Divisions, with the states that make up the Confederation of the Rhine
dct_description_sm: Par Dezauche Géographe, Successeur de Delisle et Buache. A Paris, chez l'Auteur, Rue des Noyers No. 40. 1813 ; Déposée á la Direction générale de l'Imprimerie et de la Librairie.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Longitudinal and latitudinal lines based on Paris and l'Isle de Fer meridians.
Four bar scales in "Grandes Lieues de France," "Lieues communes," "Milles communs d'Italie," "Myriamétres."
Shows various boundaries, towns and cities, various district and provincial names, waterways.
"10" on verso, taken from unknown atlas.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
